long_description: The North Face Runners gloves have wind-resistant fabric on the backs of the hands and a breathable mesh on the palms to strike the perfect balance on cool days. X-static(R) fabric on tips of the index fingers and thumbs allows you to control your smart phone, digital music player or laptop mouse pad without taking the gloves off. Stash your house key in the small pocket on the palm. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Wrist closures are shaped to accommodate wrist-top computers. The North Face Runners gloves have large, plush panels that give you a gentle place to wipe your nose.
short_description: The North Face Runners gloves have wind-resistant fabric on the backs of the hands and a breathable mesh on the palms to strike the perfect balance on cool days.
